name: Furball Trajectory
description:
Join FurBall in his quest for coin's & holes.
​
This game is built for Lefties or Righties and what ever you choose, we are sure you are going to love FurBall.

• The ultimate one finger simulation experience.
• Level up and collect more coin's to unlock epic levels.
• Fight against gravity to get FurBall into the hole's.
• Built for either Righties or Lefties.
